Package CODEX.distributed.RMI

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
CODEX.distributed.RMI.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerRMIInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerRMIInterface
This class represents the RMI server, which is unique.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws RemoteException
      Main method This method calls the method "startServer". After the calling of this method the server is able to receive the requests of the clients
      Parameters:
      args - from CLI
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • startServer

      public void startServer() throws RemoteException
      This method starts the server, so it can listen to the clients and receive their requests (the clients will invoke functions on the server)
      Specified by:
      startServer in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • createLobby

      public GameControllerInterface createLobby(String creatorNickname, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Specified by:
      createLobby in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      creatorNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to create a new lobby
      numOfPlayers - is the number of player the creator decided can play in the lobby
      Returns:
      serverController.addPlayerToLobby(player, gameId) is the game controller of the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • addPlayerToLobby

      public GameControllerInterface addPlayerToLobby(String playerNickname, int gameId) throws RemoteException, GameAlreadyStartedException, FullLobbyException, GameNotExistsException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Specified by:
      addPlayerToLobby in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to join the lobby
      gameId - is the lobby the player wants to join
      Returns:
      serverController.addPlayerToLobby(player, gameId) is the game controller of the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      GameAlreadyStartedException - thrown if a game is already started
      FullLobbyException - thrown if the lobby is full
      GameNotExistsException - thrown if there's no game

    • chooseNickname

      public void chooseNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NicknameAlreadyTakenException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Specified by:
      chooseNickname in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the String he wants to put as his nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      NicknameAlreadyTakenException - if a nickname is already used by others players
